text: We have a new Julia streamer! Go check him out here: <https://www.twitch.tv/azzaare> (cc <@U01FR2HFJ7M>)

attachments.title: azzaare - Twitch
attachments.text: Academic staff, researcher and developer using mainly Julia for researching and teaching.Member (and a mod) of the discord community Humans-of-Julia.

I am just starting tonight, I was not expecting advertisement ><
